question.text:
Read the following statements:

A. Meiosis I is completed during the conversion of the secondary follicle into the tertiary follicle.
B. Meiosis I in oogenesis is an unequal division.
C. Ovulation results in the release of the secondary oocyte

How many of the given statements are incorrect?

solution.text:
Following changes occur in the secondary follicle afterwhich it is immediately converted to tertiary follicle:

A. Development of a fluid filled cavity called antrum.

B. Differentiation of theca layer into theca interna (inner) and theca externa (outer).

C. Primary oocyte grows in size, completes meiosis-I (unequal division) resulting in the formation of a large haploid secondary oocyte and a small first polar body.
